mapper.sql: ID as id, ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, DYNAMIC_EARNINGS as dynamicEarnings, PAY_ELEC_EARNINGS as payElecEarnings, ACTIVITY_EARNINGS as activityEarnings, TOTAL_EARNINGS as totalEarnings, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, EXCHANGE_EARNINGS as exchangeEarnings, EXCEPTION_EARNINGS as exceptionEarnings
mapper.insert: insert into drt_fin_earnings_statistics (ID, ACCOUNT_ID, DYNAMIC_EARNINGS, PAY_ELEC_EARNINGS, ACTIVITY_EARNINGS, TOTAL_EARNINGS, UPDATE_TIME, EXCHANGE_EARNINGS, EXCEPTION_EARNINGS) values (#{id}, #{accountId}, #{dynamicEarnings}, #{payElecEarnings}, #{activityEarnings}, #{totalEarnings}, #{updateTime}, #{exchangeEarnings}, #{exceptionEarnings})

insert into drt_fin_earnings_statistics (ID, ACCOUNT_ID, DYNAMIC_EARNINGS, PAY_ELEC_EARNINGS, ACTIVITY_EARNINGS, TOTAL_EARNINGS, UPDATE_TIME, EXCHANGE_EARNINGS, EXCEPTION_EARNINGS) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.accountId}, #{item.dynamicEarnings}, #{item.payElecEarnings}, #{item.activityEarnings}, #{item.totalEarnings}, #{item.updateTime}, #{exchangeEarnings}, #{exceptionEarnings})
mapper.update:
update drt_fin_earnings_statistics set
ACCOUNT_ID=#{accountId},
DYNAMIC_EARNINGS=#{dynamicEarnings},
PAY_ELEC_EARNINGS=#{payElecEarnings},
ACTIVITY_EARNINGS=#{activityEarnings},
TOTAL_EARNINGS=#{totalEarnings},
UPDATE_TIME=#{updateTime},
EXCHANGE_EARNINGS=#{exchangeEarnings},
EXCEPTION_EARNINGS=#{exceptionEarnings},
ID = #{id} where ID = #{id}
